reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very nice Motel, the rooms are small and clean. Location is very good... right on main street and 2 blocks from all the restaurants.
reviews.title: Very nice accommodation

reviews.text: Also it's a 15 minutes drive to the Grand Canyon.
reviews.title: Why not make this a non-smoking motel, remove the butt cans!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was there for one night.
reviews.title: Will return - great value!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I read review after review concerning how clean this hotel is, and it is! I will also add that it did smell of smoke. You could smell the cover-up scent that they use.
reviews.title: The Sherwood Motel is a SURE thing!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Why these places don't remove all the smoking butt cans outside of the motel is beyond me. If they really wanted to stop the smoking they could "fine" those that smoke in a room or at least post that they would be billed an additional $100 if there are any signs of smoking or smoke smell when the customer leaves.
reviews.title: Location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you've never been to Wellsboro, it's good to have your expectations in line. This is a cute, small town near the Grand Canyon of PA. It's not a place you go for luxury accommodations, a romantic getaway or a girls' weekend.
reviews.title: Clean place, friendly ownership

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Sherwood is the best place to stay in Wellsboro. We have stayed there many time over the years. We tried one other place (The Penn Wells Hotel- so skeevy and gross and awful) and family has stayed at the Penn Wells Lodge (decent but not nearly as good as the Sherwood).
reviews.title: The best in town

reviews.text: The Sherwood is clean and the people who run the place are friendly and helpful. You can walk to the little town easily. There is a Dunkin' Donuts and a grocery store across the street. Pizza Hut next door. Lots of places to eat within walking distance, plus a movie theatre.
reviews.title: Did the job while visiting.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you're passing through Wellsboro, the Sherwood is by far your best option.
reviews.title: FABULOUS!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I've stayed at the Sherwood on numerous trips to the Wellsboro area and have always come away pleased with the experience. The family owned Sherwood is clean, comfortable, reasonably priced and located right in the heart of town. You can't do better for lodging anywhere in the area.
reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL motel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I were up here for a long weekend and because of the AAA rating and the fact that they had free wireless internet, decided to stay here at this motel over the other motels in the area. We were quite pleased. We had a very big room with a little refrigerator and microwave - more than adequate! This motel is right on the popular Route 6 and is right down the street from the famous Wellsboro Diner. We are planning on going back to Wellsboro and plan to book our stay here again!
reviews.title: Great place!
Awsome Independent hotel
reviews.text: Found this Hotel (but they call it a Motel) on a drive by on my motorcycle trip. Walked in and got a room. Did not prebook. Turned out to be a fine place. Very clean and all new room (carpets, paint, etc). Person behind the counter went out of her way to make sure I was all settled in and oriented about the town. Room was quiet, had a pair of chairs on the outside deck I could use to sit and watch the kids in the pool. Price was way cheaper than I expected, especially on a last minute walk-up reservation.
We stayed here during the Laurel Fest in Wellsboro and truly raved about the motel
reviews.title: Fantastic Beautiful Motel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Sherwood has recently been re-decorated & it is simply grand.
reviews.title: A nice surprise!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Absolutly NO odors in the rooms thanks to their no-smoking/no-pets policy.
reviews.title: Stay Elsewhere

likes.disliked: — It was not a non-smoking room
— rooms in front section not as large

reviews.title: Sherwood Motel is tops
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here the first weekend in May - we were attending Mansfield University's graduation ceremony. First off, the rate was considerably less than the only hotel in Mansfield (a chain). Because of that, the 13 mile drive to Mansfield was worth it!
